about_the_game:
Spellslinger Towns puts you in a magical sandbox environment merging city-building and deckbuilding. Construct, expand, and optimize your city, making strategic decisions that shape its growth. Use powerful spells from your custom deck to fortify your city, overcome enemies, and forge alliances. Manage resources, set up production lines, and navigate diplomacy to ensure your city thrives. Each playthrough offers new challenges and opportunities, providing endless possibilities to be creative and shape the destiny of your realm.

City builder meets roguelite

Construct, expand, and optimize your city with precision and flair. From humble beginnings to towering citadels, every decision you make influences the growth and prosperity of your realm. Set up well-oiled production lines, trading agreements, diplomacy, and military bases to reach the different end-goals the game offers. Play the cards you’re dealt and break the sandbox!

Deckbuilding

Craft your deck of magical cards, each offering potent spells, quests, monsters, and powerful enchantments. Fine-tune your strategy as you explore endless combinations to fortify your city, overcome your enemies, or befriend them!



  • Start with a deck of handpicked cards.
  • Draw from your deck and play the cards that ideally fit the current situation.
  • As the playthrough progresses, you'll be able to add new cards to your deck

Play crazy combinations with your cards, and try to break the simulation. Control an army of armored huskies? If you have the cards, Spellslinger Towns will let you do it.

Every run is different

Each run offers new challenges and opportunities.



Unlock new complexities and upgrades by reaching an ever-expanding array of objectives to aim for!




Spellslinger Towns was made possible by the Flanders Audiovisual Fund (VAF).

  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4570T (dual-core) / AMD® FX-Series™ FX-9590 (quad-core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 550 Ti (1 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ R9 270X (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
